$eref.description: An image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's). Schema.org: http://schema.org/MediaObject

___upvoteCount.description: The number of upvotes this question has received from the community.

___downvoteCount.description: The number of downvotes this question has received from the community.

___thumbnail.description: Thumbnail image for an image or video.

___representativeOfPage.description: Indicates whether this image is representative of the content of the page.
